data.title: Service. Support. Survival.
data.text:
Living with breast cancer is not something that you should have to do alone. Finding a support group or system that fits your needs and lifestyle is important. Click the link to learn more.

Join the Links for Life volunteer team and lend your time and talents to our organization. Click the link to learn more about how you can help make a difference in our community!

Kick off Paint the Town Pink! and Breast Cancer Awareness Month at our annual Laceâ€™n It Up 5K Fun Run & 1 Mile Celebration Walk!

Saturday, October 5, 2024, the Park at River Walk

Links for Life is a nonprofit Breast Cancer support and services organization located in Bakersfield, California and the greater Kern County area.

Our mission is:

To provide an organization to benefit persons and families affected by breast cancer.

To challenge each woman in Kern County to be aware of her breast health and promote support for those affected.

To educate the general public about breast health services for women coping with cancer.
